We need a null check on what is returned from getSubscriberInput() since it 
can be null if the view has not been open yet or if it has been closed.

Fixed. Released to HEAD.
Basically the CVS sync pages should of been registering for change events only 
once the page has been created. Instead it was happening in the constructor.
